node.text:
After all the wonderful city tours and a host of indoor & outdoor games, let your hair down and rest those tired feet with our pampering head or foot massage. The 2 nights & 3 days Sight & Culture Winter Package at The Raviz Kovalam has this and so much more to offer you.

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
